name: Coin Odyssey
description:
Coin Odyssey is the modern tale of what it’s like to be a coin on the run. When everyone on the planet is looking for money, living life as a currency is difficult. Other coins accept their harsh fate, but you decide to run until you can’t anymore.Goal

Your job is simple: escape before he catches you. Slowly flip your way to the exit, and boost yourself when necessary.

There are a total of 5 levels, each focusing on a specific challenge. Each level has a different layout of obstacles. The further you get into the game, the harder the levels become. Each level is beatable.

Controls KeyActionWMoveA, D, MOUSETurnSPACEBoostMOUSECamera

This game was created for Ludum Dare 44: Your life is Currency.
